sen.j: 多賀SLパーク（たがエスエルパーク）は、かつて滋賀県犬上郡多賀町敏満寺にあったSLホテルである。
sen.e: Taga Steam Locomotive (SL) Park was at one time the SL Hotel that was located at Binmanji, Taga-cho, Inukami-gun, Saga Prefecture.
Taga Steam Locomotive (SL) Park was at one time the SL Hotel that was located at Binmanji, Taga-cho, Inukami-gun, Saga Prefecture.
Taga Steam Locomotive (SL) Park was at one time the SL Hotel that was located at Binmanji, Taga-cho, Inukami-gun, Saga Prefecture.

sen.j: 当時の全国的なSLホテル開業ブームに乗り、1976年に開業。
sen.e: At the time there was a boom in establishing SL Hotels: this one starting operating in 1976.
At the time there was a boom in establishing SL Hotels: this one starting operating in 1976.
At the time there was a boom in establishing SL Hotels: this one starting operating in 1976.

sen.j: 近江鉄道多賀線多賀大社前駅に近い場所に立地していた。
sen.e: It was located nearby the front of Taga-Taishamae Station, Omi Railways Taga Line
It was located nearby the front of Taga-Taishamae Station, Omi Railways Taga Line
It was located nearby the Tagataishamae Station, Omi Railway Taga Line.
sen.cmt: 誤訳を修正→the front of を削除Railways→Railway

sen.j: 国鉄D51形蒸気機関車（D51 1149）とB寝台客車3両（国鉄10系客車）を設置し、宿泊施設として使用した。
sen.e: A Japan Railways D51 Class Steam Locomotive (D51 1149) and 3 carriages of a B Sleeper (JR 10 class carriages) were located at the site and used as accommodation.
A Japan Railways D51 Class Steam Locomotive (D51 1149) and 3 carriages of a B Sleeper (JR 10 class carriages) were located at the site and used as accommodation.
A Japan Railways D51 Class Steam Locomotive (D51 1149) and 3 carriages of a B Sleeper (JR 10 class carriages) were located at the site and used as accommodation.

sen.j: 車両の搬入は彦根駅から近江鉄道の電気機関車が牽引して多賀大社前駅（当時は多賀駅）まで輸送され、オープンに際して近江鉄道が発行した記念乗車券にはその写真があしらわれていた。
sen.e: To mark the opening, Omi Railways issued a commemorative ticket depicting the scene when the carriages were brought from Hikone station to Taga-Taishamae Station by an Omi Railways electric locomotive.

To mark the opening, Omi Railways issued a commemorative ticket depicting the scene when the carriages were brought from Hikone station to Taga-Taishamae Station by an Omi Railways electric locomotive.

To mark the opening, Omi Railway issued a commemorative ticket depicting the scene when the carriages were brought from Hikone Station to Tagataishamae Station (Taga Station at that time) by an Omi Railway electric locomotive.
The hotel closed in the 1980`s.
The hotel closed in the 1980`s.
The hotel closed in the 1980's.

sen.j: その後は同じ敷地にあったレストラン共々そのまま放置されていたが、客車は1995年12月に解体された。
sen.e: Afterwards the carriages were left in the same location and used as a restaurant but, the carriages were disassembled in December 1995.
Afterwards the carriages were left in the same location and used as a restaurant but, the carriages were disassembled in December 1995.
Afterwards the carriages as well as restaurants in the same location were left as they were but, the carriages were disassembled in December 1995.

sen.j: 現在は機関車のみ現存しており、荒廃している。
sen.e: Currently only the steam loco remains and, is falling into disrepair.
Currently only the steam loco remains and, is falling into disrepair.
Currently only the steam loco remains and is falling into disrepair.
